references.reason: This paper introduces the Transformer architecture, which is used in language models (LMs) and adapted in the proposed approach.

references.paper_title: Self-referencing embedded strings (SELFIES): A 100% robust molecular string representation
references.reason: This paper introduces SELFIES, a 100% robust molecular string representation, which guarantees the validity of generated molecules.

references.paper_title: Equivariant diffusion for molecule generation in 3d
references.reason: This paper explores diffusion models for molecule generation in 3D, which is one of the main building blocks of the study.

references.paper_title: Llama 2: Open foundation and fine-tuned chat models
references.reason: This paper introduces the Llama 2 architecture, which is utilized as the back bone of the 1D molecule LMs.

references.paper_title: JODO: Joint 2D and 3D Molecule Generation for De Novo Design
references.reason: This paper presents a joint 2D and 3D molecule generation diffusion model, and shares an idea about how to retain full information of 2D molecular graphs.
